Lilly caught. hold of him, and found that his cost and hands were covered with. whitewash, and on belisg:asked to @account for it “he said , 'I have.just come-from a fire ; I'l) sliow you where it is,” On reaching No. 9, which is an unoccupied house, prisoner pulled open the shutters and said, @Can't you hearthe fire now ? and Lilly then heard the crackling of wood.
